channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [BHS1A][VMwarePrivateCloud] - Virtual machines migration
item.description:
May 2, 08:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 26, 23:22 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/05/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 02/05/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management plane will not be available during the operation.
A downtime of 5 minutes per virtual machine is expected.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing a migration for the virtual machines in the vApp.

item.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - GWSSL operation
item.description:

Apr 25, 22:04 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/05/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/05/2023 18:00 UTC

Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform a operation on deployments of the GatewaySSL VMs.

item.title: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] - vCenter major upgrade and and ESXi upgrade
item.description:
May 2, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 26, 21:59 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/05/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 26/05/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere and Zerto will be inaccessible for 3 hours during the maintenance. Hosts will be rebooted, but there is no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service

item.title: [RBX][Hosted Private cloud] - Storage Incident Notification
item.description:
Apr 14, 07:48 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/04/2023 17:55 UTC
End Time : 13/04/2023 21:47 UTC
Root cause : Incident caused by a failure on a cooling module.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 13, 20:05 UTC
Identified - Root cause : Incident caused by a failure on a cooling module.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on this issue.

Apr 13, 18:37 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 13/04/2023 17:55 UTC
User impact : No access to storage cluster9714 in RBX2A.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2A
Ongoing Actions: Our technical teams are investigating on this issue.
Pools affected :
ssd-016193
ssd-016186
ssd-017861
ssd-016243
ssd-017863
ssd-017876
ssd-017877
ssd-017878
